connector.heading: Protokolibri Device Connection Service
connector.title: Connect Device
connector.cta: Select this device and press connect
connector.help: Name missing? Add new names in the dashboard or ask you administrator
connector.warning: WARNING! If you do this you will disconnect the previously connected device

redirect.title: Redirecting...
redirect.message: You should be redirected to the Protokolibri Browser Extension...
redirect.help: You don't get redirected? Please check if you have installed and activated it in the settings app
